Class CourseViewerSwitchableLinkedList

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractCourseViewer
      • CourseViewerSwitchableLinkedList

  • public class CourseViewerSwitchableLinkedList
extends AbstractCourseViewer
    Course viewer class that uses standard switchable linked list class that extends the standard linked list class to hold courses. Extends the Abstract Course viewer because all course viewing mechanisms share the same principles.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private SwitchableLinkedList<Course> sllCopy
      reference copy of the main linked list in parent class all methods in this class uses this field because it constructs as a switchable linked list.

        listOfCourses
